subject: Quick note: Secure a 20-minute discovery call
body:
Data quality metrics for synthetic data include fidelity (how closely it resembles real data), diversity, and privacy preservation. 
VAEs, or Variational Autoencoders, are generative models based on data compression principles. 
Poorly annotated data can lead to inaccurate or unreliable AI models. 
AI models trained on biased data can perpetuate and amplify existing societal biases. 
Differential privacy adds noise to data to limit the identifiability of individuals while preserving statistical properties.

Goal: Secure a 20-minute discovery call
